I was worried about frauds..but brandikonic changed my mind!​

I wanted to convert my logo into 3D and was searching on Google for a good graphics designer. At the same time, I was worried as there are many fake/frauds out there so it's not easy to trust. Then I found Brand Ikonic and don't know why but I contacted them straight away. They are very responsive. They have done my logo works beautifully. If you are also looking for graphic designers for your Logo design then just connect with Brand Ikonic. It’s that simple 🤗

Mrinal Sarma

Owner - Size M

 5/5

They're really skilled at winning hearts!

Great Work on my Logo by Brandikonic team. Initially, I was provided with a Hindi-speaking customer manager and the logo was very bad due to communication issues and I got a feeling that I got cheated. But later they quickly resolved it by providing an English-speaking customer support manager and as a result, I got the best of the best logo. In simple words, Whatever there on my mind they just got it done. Simple. Extremely happy and very patient enough to do multiple revisions.

Ram

Founder - Kaya

How It Work

Tell us what you need

Fill Out a simple brief to help designers understand your design needs.

Give feedback & get revisions

Tell us about the changes you need.

Approve & download

Approve the design you love and get all the source files and bonuses delivered.

Good logo design doesn’t have to be difficult.

Designs that make your customers say "wow"

You’ll get exceptional logo designs that are attractive & unique while representing your vision, mission & values elegantly.

When I got the first draft of my design, I could only say one thing "Wow. Not what I expected."

With direct call access to the dedicated brand expert who cares about your brand, We leave no chance for error!

Let's Build Your Brand!

What if I don’t like the designs?

This is the most common question we get. we’re so confident that you’ll love your logo so much that we have a downright

100% Money-Back Guarantee

Get the design you love or your money back. it’s as simple as that.

We believe if our clients are happy only then can we stay and thrive in business for the long term. for some reason, if you don’t feel satisfied we’re not satisfied as well either we do everything we can to make you happy or you’ll get 100% money back after seeing the first design.

if you want to see all the designs then you be eligible for only a 50% refund.
